original_text: 90 punitive minutes of eardrum-dicing gunplay , screeching-metal smashups , and flaccid odd-couple sniping .
generated_text:
1. "A mind-numbing 2 hours of ear-piercing explosions, cringe-worthy one-liners, and awkward buddy comedy."
